lead_paragraph: A person with direct knowledge of the decision says the New York Jets are making no changes in leadership, meaning both coach Todd Bowles and general manager Mike Maccagnan will remain with the team next season.
snippet: A person with direct knowledge of the decision says the New York Jets are making no changes in leadership, meaning both coach Todd Bowles and general manager Mike Maccagnan will remain with the team next season....

headline.main: AP Source: Jets Keeping Bowles, Maccagnan for Next Season
headline.print_headline: AP Source: Jets Keeping Bowles, Maccagnan for Next Season
